Text:

I'm having the same problem with the subs as 737Almost_Every_Day. They're all just question marks or random characters.
Figured it out. They're Korean and Chinese subtitles; completely of no use to us native English speakers. Please change the subtitle language in the torrent description to reflect that accurately.
ARGH I cant seem to find the right subtitles for this on the web. please post a link if you find one.
